Posts.EditableText: How do I set up an exit that you can "jump", "climb", etc. with (i.e., instead of typing "up", the player types "climb"?
Posts.HTML: How do I set up an exit that you can "jump", "climb", etc. with (i.e., instead of typing "up", the player types "climb"?

Posts.EditableText: You can set up a command "climb" or "climb #exit#" (not tested the second one but it should work, as that's the way the "go (direction)" command works).
Posts.HTML: You can set up a command "climb" or "climb #exit#" (not tested the second one but it should work, as that's the way the "go (direction)" command works).
